attributes.action: Deploy the Royal Navy in the English Channel to turn back illegal crossings.
attributes.additional_details: By allowing the illegal immigrants to set foot on BRITISH SOIL there is no deterant to stop there crossing attempts.  Allowing them to reach our shores is estimated at costing the BRITISH TAXPAYERS £8,000,000 a day. This BRITISH TAXPAYERS MONEY would be better spent on BRITISH PEOPLE. NHS,SCHOOLS,HOUSING and future inferstucture.
attributes.background: Use the ROYAL NAVY to patrol the ENGLISH CHANNEL and turn back the illegal crossings. Preventing these illegal immigrants from entering BRITISH WATERS.  This will not cost the British taxpayers any extra money as the ROYAL NAVY is already paid for.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for a similar action:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/641012
